attributes.additional_details:
Inheritance tax is a mostly unfair and punitive tax that has become in modern times out of date. First used in days where lords, ladies and the landed gentry lived off of inheritance and other assets as the only way of taxation. It is hitting working farm owners who are already struggling and citizens who wish to inherit family homes and small savings from their relatives.
People pay tax all their lives and to tax their assets on their passing is fundamentally wrong
